mapper.sql: ID AS id, MODEL_PROCDEF_ID AS modelProcdefId, SENCE_VERSION_ID AS senceVersionId, IS_EFFECT AS isEffect, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, CREATE_USER AS createUser
mapper.select: select a.sence_version_id as senceVersionId,b.title as senceName,b.scene_identify as senceCode from risk_model_sence a inner join rule_scene_version b on a.SENCE_VERSION_ID = b.version_id where a.MODEL_PROCDEF_ID = #{modelProcdefId}
